DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study characterize single-dose pharmacokinetic ( PK ) single escalate intravenous ( IV ) dose JNJ-63623872 administer continuous infusion ; evaluate safety tolerability single escalate IV dos JNJ-63623872 administer continuous infusion ; characterize single-dose PK JNJ-63623872 one select dose administer continuous IV infusion various duration characterize single- repeat-dose PK JNJ-63623872 administer continuous infusion .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Absolute Bioavailability Study JNJ-63623872 Administered Intravenous Infusion 600-Milligram ( mg ) Oral Dose Healthy Adults
